word:
Young ladies frequently give themselves up to study, to the neglect of other branches of education even more essential for practical life than the study of books. And 
                                                                           286
after having obtained their education, they are often invalids for life. They have neglected their health by remaining too much indoors, deprived of the pure air of heaven and of the God-given sunlight. These young women might have come from school in health had they combined with their studies household labor and exercise in the open air.
